sentence: In its statement, the committee said Trump's campaign director, Michael A. Roman, and deputy director, Gary Michael Brown, took part in efforts to "promote allegations of fraud in the November 2020 election and encourage state legislators to appoint false 'alternate' slates of electors."
author: Daniel Uria
title: Jan. 6 committee issues subpoenas seeking information on alternate elector plots

sentence: The individuals subpoenaed include Michael Roman and Gary Michael Brown, who served as directors for Trump's 2020 reelection campaign.
author: FARNOUSH AMIRI
title: Jan. 6 panel subpoenas 6 more in fake GOP electors scheme

sentence: In a letter to Mastriano, Thompson wrote, we understand that you spoke with former President Trump about your post-election activities.? CNBC Politics Read more of CNBCs politics coverage: Vote on Biden Fed picks delayed as GOP presses for answers on Raskins ties to firm Prince Andrew settles sex abuse lawsuit by Jeffrey Epstein victim Giuffre Remington to pay $73 million to families of Sandy Hook shooting victims The other subpoenas were issued to Michael Roman and Gary Michael Brown, who led Election Day operations for Trumps 2020 campaign; Michigan GOP Chair Laura Cox; and Arizona State Representative Mark Finchem.
author: Kevin Breuninger
title: House probe of Jan. 6 Capitol riot subpoenas Arizona GOP leader Kelli Ward, 5 others over alternate electors

sentence: Former Michigan Republican Party Chair Laura Cox was subpoenaed too along with Michael Roman, Trumps director of election operations in 2020, and his deputy, Gary Michael Brown.
title: State officials pushing Trump alternate elector scheme come into focus
